item.title: The Surprising Answer to the Question: Should I Stay Home During Roof Replacement?
item.description: Introduction Replacing a roof is a big job and it can be a stressful experience for homeowners One of the biggest questions homeowners have is whether they should stay home during the roof replacement process The answer to this question is not as straightforward as you might think Reasons to Stay Home During Roof Replacement There are several reasons why you might want to stay home during the roof replacement process.
